name: outline-knowledge-base
description: Access and search your Outline knowledge base from Claude Desktop
long_description: This extension provides seamless integration with Outline knowledge bases, allowing you to search documents, retrieve content, and access team knowledge directly from Claude Desktop. Perfect for teams using Outline for documentation and knowledge management.

tools.name: search_documents
tools.description: Search for documents across your Outline knowledge base

tools.name: get_document
tools.description: Retrieve the full content of a specific document

tools.name: list_collections
tools.description: List all collections in your Outline knowledge base

tools.name: get_document_info
tools.description: Get metadata about a specific document

prompts.name: knowledge_search
prompts.description: Search and analyze knowledge base content
prompts.text: Search the knowledge base for information about: ${arguments.query}. Context: ${arguments.context}

prompts.name: document_summary
prompts.description: Summarize a specific document from the knowledge base
prompts.text: Please provide a comprehensive summary of the document with ID: ${arguments.document_id}

api_url.title: Outline API URL
api_url.description: The base URL of your Outline instance (e.g., https://your-team.getoutline.com)

validation.message: Please enter a valid URL starting with http:// or https://

api_token.title: API Token
api_token.description: Your Outline API token (found in Settings > API)

validation.message: API token must be at least 10 characters long

max_results.title: Maximum Search Results
max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return from searches

include_archived.title: Include Archived Documents
include_archived.description: Whether to include archived documents in search results
